name: Pirates vs. Corsairs - Davy Jones' Gold
name_original: Pirates vs. Corsairs - Davy Jones' Gold
description:
Pirates vs. Corsairs - Davy Jones' Gold is a strategy game developed by Microids. It came out on 23-05-2013. It was published by Microids.
Pirates vs. Corsairs - Davy Jones' Gold is available on PC, Classic Macintosh, iOS and Android.
